mapper.select: select fee_value.id, fee_value.name, fee_value.unit, fee_value.fee_key_id, fk.id, fk.name fee_key_name from fee_value join fee_key fk on fk.id = fee_value.fee_key_id where fk.is_deleted = 0 and fee_value.is_deleted = 0 and fee_value.id in (select fee_value_id from apartment_fee_value where is_deleted = 0 and apartment_id = #{id})
